topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ac849c63687265225a0c00#post_54ac849c63687265225a0c00
[bq="mariomarc"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ac84696368722d881d0200#post_54ac84696368722d881d0200
if you weren't gay, that sentence would be considered creepy[/bq]
Sukuna is this character:
!http://en.touhouwiki.net/images/1/11/FS_Shinmyoumaru_Sukuna.png!
!https://41.media.tumblr.com/9c06ed2961ad07599aa94bff9abe1cd8/tumblr_nf78j6BNKy1tdve5xo1_500.png!

Personally what I would like for most in the franchise is more side stories, manga, games and such; there's already a hundred amazing characters all with distinct personalities, why not expand a bit on their backstory and such?
